item.title: Episode #211 ... Nietzsche returns with a hammer!
item.description: Today we talk about Nietzsche's views on the decay of western society. We talk about his problems with Socrates. The genealogy of Egalitarianism that has led to our modern societies, and how to contextualize his concept of the Ubermensch within modern culture. Hope you enjoy it! :) Sponsors: Lumen: https://www.lumen.me/PT AG1: https://www.DrinkAg1.com/philo Better Help: https://www.BetterHelp.com/PHILTHIS Thank you so much for listening! Could never do this without your help... Feed: https://feeds.megaphone.fm/QCD6036500916

item.title: Science Fiction is a normalization machine (with Rob Cameron)
item.description: Science fiction is great at helping people get used to strange concepts — or people — and making us see them as more "normal." But what does "normal" mean, and is it always a good thing? Later in the episode, we talk to Rob Cameron, author of the... Feed: https://ouropinionsarecorrect.libsyn.com/rss
